channel.title: Why Sleep? - The Benefits of Life Enhancing Sleep
channel.description: Each episode topic will focus on sleep issues related to health, safety and performance. They will offer effective tips for improving sleep and discuss the health risks associated with inadequate sleep. Quanta Dynamics also produces sleep materials and features a digital album of music called "Night Light", created especially for promoting good sleep. "Night Light" is available on iTunes.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Benefits of Life Enhancing Sleep

item.title: Workplace Issues - Part 2
item.description:
Guest: Kathy Ohlmann, RN. MSN. COHNS.
President, Work Place Solutions

Workplace Issues - Part 2

A Fatigue Management Program for Shift Workers

-- Investigate recent sleep research
-- Provide Sleep training
-- Place bright lights in work area
-- Examine work schedules
-- Allow sufficient breaks and days off
-- Provide healthy food choices

item.title: The Effects of Short Sleep
item.description:
There are consequences to not getting adequate sleep.
Sleep deprivation:
 
- Creates a sleep debt
- Decreases alertness levels
- Impacts performance and productivity
- Strains relationships
- Affects moods and behavior

Visit our web site at www.QuantaDynamics.com for more resources on the benefits of life enhancing sleep.
item.itunes:keywords: sleep, insomnia, sleep deprivation, sleep presentations, sleep workshops, reduce healthcare costs
